title: Video Editor (100% Remote | PH Timezone)
job_overview:
Monday – Friday | 8 AM – 5 PM PHT
Filipino Applicants Only

About the Role
Are you a story-driven, detail-obsessed Video Editor who loves turning raw footage into scroll-stopping, high-impact content? Do you live for transitions that feel just right, and edits that give goosebumps?
We’re looking for a talented Video Editor to join our growing remote creative team. If you thrive in a fast-moving, feedback-rich environment where your creative voice matters — we want to hear from you.

What You’ll Do:
• Craft polished, engaging videos that tell meaningful stories
•Work alongside project managers and creative leads to deliver exciting client work
• Implement feedback efficiently while maintaining creative integrity
• Edit across a wide range of formats: social media, branded content, ads, explainers, and more
• Communicate clearly and reliably with your team

Requirements:
• Strong experience in video editing tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent
• Excellent English communication (both written and spoken)
• A good eye for pacing, storytelling, and visual rhythm
• A solid portfolio showcasing a range of video editing work
• A reliable setup: capable computer, stable internet, 720p+ webcam, and clear audio headset or mic

Perks & Benefits:
• Work with global brands across industries — from tech and fashion to non-profits and entertainment
• Creative freedom: You're not just pushing buttons — you're telling stories
• Remote culture: Work from anywhere in the Philippines
• Stability: Long-term role with a low-turnover, supportive team
• Recognition: Compete for Editor of the Month, earn internal badges, and get noticed
• Career growth: Access to training, mentorship, and a team that supports your development
• Monthly PTO (Paid Time Off): Take time to reset and recharge
• Earn points for attending events — convert them into rewards and recognition
• Maternity/Paternity Leave: Paid leave available for qualified employees (1+ year + performance-based eligibility)
• Wellness support: Talk to someone when needed — mental health care is covered
• Fun & community: Join design contests, team games, even e-sports events
• Paid holidays & leave accumulation — rest is encouraged, not frowned upon!

How to Apply:

Upgrade to see actual info

 ilovevideoediting (or use the phrase given in your job post)
3. Attach your portfolio or relevant work samples when prompted.
